name: Ninja Jump - Deluxe
description:
Want a simple yet exciting game you can play for hours on end? Look no further! Ninja Jump Deluxe has it all!

Use your Ninja skills with the touch of a finger to jump past enemy ninjas and their weapons! Collect coins for power ups and Ninja kick objects for points. Compete with players from all over the world for the world high score!

How to Play:
~Touch the screen to make your character leap to the other side.
~Evade objects coming down at you.
~Jump into objects to break them for points!
~Collect the coins to gain points and shields!
~50 coins gets you 1 shield!
~A shield makes you invincible for 5 seconds!
~Jump as high as you can to get the highest score against players around the world!



What do you get in Ninja Jump Deluxe?

~3 Exciting new worlds
~Skyscraper Run!
~Castle Dash!
~Spacerun Frenzy!

~6 Brand new characters with new abilities!
~Ninja
~Pirate
~Army Man
~Spartan
~Spaceman
~King

~All new graphics and animations
~Collectable items and a ton of achievements!
~Flying enemies and special items
~Power Ups!
~Brand new menu system!
~New back end for added stability

~iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iPad 2, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Air, and iPod Compatible!
~Must have IOS 5.0 or higher!
